alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 16 at 10:54AM EST until December 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Water levels are running about 1 to 1.5 feet above the predicted tides this morning, and the combination of strong onshore winds will result in the potential for moderate saltwater flooding. Peak water levels during the early morning high tides will reach around 1.5 feet above mean higher high water. * WHERE...Middle and Lower Florida Keys. * WHEN...Through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is expected. Flooding will be exacerbated by bouts of heavy rainfall. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys
